name: SquaryShip
description:
Welcome to SquaryShip!

In this game, You play as a square that tries to find his probably real ship.

This game was made in 3 days (not 7) for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

Install instructions:

Download the appropriate version from the download page, unpack it and run the SquaryShip.exe file for Windows and SquaryShip.x86_64 for GNU/Linux.
